attributes.action: Ban all movements of lgv's on Sundays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see the UK bought into line with Europe with NO lgv movements allowed on Sundays except emergency vehicles and recovery trucks , bringing an end to seven days of misery caused by lorries traveling at 40 mph on 'A' roads 
France manages without trucks blocking the roads on sundays and this will also stop forign truck drivers abusing driving hours over here, where checks on them are derisory

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
